title: Legalized States Driving Cannabis Growth
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Will cannabis get rescheduled or descheduled? BDSA CEO Roy Bingham discusses why the implications of that answer are dramatic. Conducting market research and data for the cannabis industry, state by state legalization, development of the illicit market and its lack of consequences. Why he's cautious about the international market.
content:encoded: Will cannabis get rescheduled or descheduled? BDSA CEO Roy Bingham discusses why the implications of that answer are dramatic. Conducting market research and data for the cannabis industry, state by state legalization, development of the illicit market and its lack of consequences. Why he's cautious about the international market.
